channel.title: Rsc advertisement board
channel.description:
You may now advertise your [b]RUNESCAPE CLASSIC SERVERS, [u]NOT NORMAL RS2 SERVERS![/u][/b] Anyone who advertises a RS2 Server [b]will be punished. [/b]
Also, you may [b]NOT[/b] advertise your forums!
I want to add this on: Some of you might have saw Silver Lining around on the forums, well sadly he recently committed suicide. More info can be found [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,275521.0.html]here[/url]
Thanks, Staff and Moparscape Moderation Team.

item.title: Rsc advertisement board
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

You may now advertise your RUNESCAPE CLASSIC SERVERS, NOT NORMAL RS2 SERVERS!
Anyone who advertises a RS2 Server will be punished.

Also, you may NOT advertise your forums!

I want to add this on:
Some of you might have saw Silver Lining around on the forums, well sadly he recently committed suicide.
More info can be found here

Thanks,
Staff and Moparscape Moderation Team.
